bibl.title: Letter from Archie S. Woods to Philip Showalter Hench, October 22, 1940

div1.p: Woods congratulates Hench on his honorary degree, but will not be able to attend the ceremony.

div1.head: Letter from Archie S. Woods to Philip Showalter Hench, October 22, 1940
div1.opener:
THE JOHN AND MARY R. MARKLE FOUNDATION
FOURTEEN WALL STREET
NEW YORK CITY
October 22, 1940
ARCHIE S. WOODS
VICE PRESIDENT
Dr. Philip S. Hench
The Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minnesota
Dear Phil:
div1.p:
I am delighted to learn that you are to receive an honorary
degree from Washington and Jefferson. I have received an invitation
to attend the ceremonies and were it not for other engagements I
certainly would plan my time so that I could be on hand to see if it
“takes” as well as it did in Easton. Keep up the good work!
With kindest regards to the whole Hench family, I am
